016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jetty.server;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import jakarta.inject.Inject;
020import jakarta.inject.Named;
021import jakarta.inject.Provider;
022import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
023import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
024import org.eclipse.jetty.alpn.server.ALPNServerConnectionFactory;
025import org.eclipse.jetty.http2.server.HTTP2CServerConnectionFactory;
026import org.eclipse.jetty.http2.server.HTTP2ServerConnectionFactory;
027import org.eclipse.jetty.server.*;
028import org.eclipse.jetty.util.ssl.SslContextFactory;
029import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Factory;
030import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Immediate;
031import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
032import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
033
034@Service(name = "jetty.server")
035@RunLevel(4)
036public class JettyServerFactory
037        implements Factory<Server> {
038    private final Server server;
039
040    @Inject
041    public JettyServerFactory(Configuration configuration, Provider<SslContextFactory.Server> sslContextFactoryProvider, Logger logger) {
042
043        JettyServerConfiguration jettyConfig = new JettyServerConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("jetty.server"));
044        JettyServerHttp2Configuration jettyHttp2Config = new JettyServerHttp2Configuration(configuration.getConfiguration("jetty.server.http2"));
045        JettyServerSslConfiguration jettyServerSslConfiguration = new JettyServerSslConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("jetty.server.ssl"));
046
047        int httpPort = jettyConfig.getHttpPort();
048        int httpsPort = jettyServerSslConfiguration.getPort();
049
050        // Setup thread pool
051        JettyConnectorThreadPool jettyConnectorThreadPool = new JettyConnectorThreadPool();
052        jettyConnectorThreadPool.setName("jetty-http-server-");
053        jettyConnectorThreadPool.setMinThreads(jettyConfig.getMinThreads());
054        jettyConnectorThreadPool.setMaxThreads(jettyConfig.getMaxThreads());
055
056        // Create server
057        server = new Server(jettyConnectorThreadPool);
058
059        // Setup connector
060        final HttpConfiguration httpConfig = new HttpConfiguration();
061        httpConfig.setOutputBufferSize(jettyConfig.getOutputBufferSize());
062        httpConfig.setRequestHeaderSize(jettyConfig.getRequestHeaderSize());
063
064        // Added for X-Forwarded-For support, from ALB
065        httpConfig.addCustomizer(new ForwardedRequestCustomizer());
066
067        // Setup protocols
068
069        // Clear-text protocols
070        if (jettyConfig.isHttpEnabled()) {
071            HttpConnectionFactory http11 = new HttpConnectionFactory(httpConfig);
072            ServerConnector httpConnector;
073            if (jettyHttp2Config.isEnabled()) {
074                // The ConnectionFactory for clear-text HTTP/2.
075                HTTP2CServerConnectionFactory h2c = new HTTP2CServerConnectionFactory(httpConfig);
076
077                // Create and configure the HTTP 1.1/2 connector
078                httpConnector = new ServerConnector(server, http11, h2c);
079            } else {
080                // Create and configure the HTTP 1.1 connector
081                httpConnector = new ServerConnector(server, http11);
082            }
083            httpConnector.setIdleTimeout(jettyConfig.getIdleTimeout().toSeconds());
084            httpConnector.setPort(httpPort);
085            server.addConnector(httpConnector);
086        }
087
088        // SSL
089        if (jettyServerSslConfiguration.isEnabled()) {
090
091            SslContextFactory.Server sslContextFactory = sslContextFactoryProvider.get();
092            server.addBean(sslContextFactory);
093
094            final HttpConfiguration sslHttpConfig = new HttpConfiguration();
095            sslHttpConfig.setOutputBufferSize(jettyConfig.getOutputBufferSize());
096            sslHttpConfig.setRequestHeaderSize(jettyConfig.getRequestHeaderSize());
097
098            SecureRequestCustomizer customizer = new SecureRequestCustomizer();
099            customizer.setSniRequired(jettyServerSslConfiguration.isSniRequired());
100            customizer.setSniHostCheck(jettyServerSslConfiguration.isSniHostCheck());
101            sslHttpConfig.addCustomizer(customizer);
102
103            // Added for X-Forwarded-For support, from ALB
104            sslHttpConfig.addCustomizer(new ForwardedRequestCustomizer());
105
106            HttpConnectionFactory sslHttp11 = new HttpConnectionFactory(sslHttpConfig);
107
108            // The ALPN ConnectionFactory.
109            ALPNServerConnectionFactory alpn = new ALPNServerConnectionFactory();
110            // The default protocol to use in case there is no negotiation.
111            alpn.setDefaultProtocol(sslHttp11.getProtocol());
112
113            SslConnectionFactory tls = new SslConnectionFactory(sslContextFactory, alpn.getProtocol());
114
115            // Create and configure the secure HTTP 1.1/2 connector, with ALPN negotiation
116            ServerConnector httpsConnector;
117            if (jettyHttp2Config.isEnabled()) {
118                HTTP2ServerConnectionFactory h2 = new HTTP2ServerConnectionFactory(sslHttpConfig);
119                httpsConnector = new ServerConnector(server, tls, alpn, h2, sslHttp11);
120            } else {
121                httpsConnector = new ServerConnector(server, tls, alpn, sslHttp11);
122            }
123            httpsConnector.setIdleTimeout(jettyConfig.getIdleTimeout().toSeconds());
124            httpsConnector.setPort(httpsPort);
125            server.addConnector(httpsConnector);
126        }
127
128        Slf4jRequestLogWriter requestLog = new Slf4jRequestLogWriter();
129        requestLog.setLoggerName("jetty");
130        server.setRequestLog(
131                new CustomRequestLog(requestLog, "%{client}a - %u %t \"%r\" %s %O \"%{Referer}i\" \"%{User-Agent}i\""));
132    }
133
134    @Override
135    @Singleton
136    @Named("jetty.server")
137    public Server provide() {
138        return server;
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    public void dispose(Server instance) {
143    }
144}
